DEL COLLEGIO DE LORETO

105 (103165 17 500 sacerdotes, y todos 001-1113013 (161 senor (corno
1311013160 60 105 demas cossegios) 56 651061230 (16 yr 51610016 3(16-

1600135, (11501011035 y 60 01135 010111603010065, (106 001 ’31ςο005
(1135 10(105 (161030013100 31 superior.
